contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Xylophanes chiron | image = Xylophanes chiron nechus MHNT dos.jpg | image_width = 250px | image_caption = ''Xylophanes chiron'' - [[MHNT]] | image2 = Xylophanes chiron nechus MHNT ventre.jpg | image2_width = 250px | image2_caption = ''Xylophanes chiron'' â–³ - [[MHNT]] | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropod]]a | classis = [[Insect]]a | ordo = [[Lepidoptera]] | familia = [[Sphingidae]] | genus = ''[[Xylophanes]]'' | species = '''''X. chiron''''' | binomial = ''Xylophanes chiron'' | binomial_authority = ([[Dru Drury|Drury]], 1771)<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.cate-sphingidae.org/taxonomy/Xylophanes/chiron.html |title=CATE Creating a Taxonomic eScience - Sphingidae |publisher=Cate-sphingidae.org |date= |accessdate=2011-10-25}}</ref> | synonyms = *''Sphinx chiron'' <small>Drury, 1773</small> *''Sphinx sagittata'' <small>Goeze, 1780</small> *''Sphinx butus'' <small>Fabricius, 1787</small> *''Choerocampa druryi'' <small>Boisduval, 1875</small> *''Choerocampa haitensis'' <small>Butler, 1875</small> *''Sphinx chiron nechus'' <small>Cramer, 1777</small> *''Xylophanes chiron martiniquensis'' <small>Kernbach, 1964</small> }} '''''Xylophanes chiron''''' is a [[moth]] of the Family [[Sphingidae]]. It can be found in [[Mexico]] down to Northern [[Argentina]] and in [[Guadeloupe]], [[Martinique]] and [[Jamaica]]. [[Image:Xylophanes chiron.jpg|thumb|left|200px]] The [[wingspan]] range is 77-81 mm. The larvae feed on [[Rubiaceae]] species. ==Subspecies== *''Xylophanes chiron chiron'' *''Xylophanes chiron cubanus'' <small>Rothschild & Jordan, 1906</small> (Cuba) *''Xylophanes chiron lucianus'' <small>Rothschild & Jordan, 1906</small> (Dominica) *''Xylophanes chiron nechus'' <small>(Cramer, 1777)</small> (Brazil) ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.silkmoths.bizland.com/xchirchi.htm ''Xylophanes chiron''] Sphingidae of the Americas [[Category:Xylophanes]] [[Category:Animals described in 1771]] {{Xylophanes-stub}}
